categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starships

nodes.text: The Rimrunner group was a group of BFF-1 bulk freighters working for the Alliance to Restore the Republic. It was destroyed by Imperial forces during their attack on Organarms.
The group's name is spelled "Rimmrunner" in Star Wars: TIE Fighter and "Rim Runner" in TIE Fighter Collector's CD-ROM: The Official Strategy Guide.
